title: Epic Concert Talk  (feat. Katie Nolan & Josh Adam Meyers)
description:
Dan's lovely and talented girlfriend Katie Nolan comes on The Bonfire for the first time with Josh Adam Meyers to review the Korn show everyone saw together last week !

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Josh Adam Meyers, Katie Nolan)
